          <title>
            <string language="de">Umsiedlung im Braunkohlenbergbau. Erfahrungen und Perspektiven</string>
            <string language="en">Resettlement in lignite mining. Experiences and perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reclassement dans l'exploitation de lignite. 
Expériences et perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resettlement na mineração do lignite. 
Experiências e perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riassestamento nell'estrazione mineraria della 
lignite. Esperienze e prospettive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επανατακτοποίηση στη μεταλλεία λιγνίτη. Εμπειρία
και προοπτικές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Restablecimiento en la explotación minera del 
lignito. Experiencias y perspectivas</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Dokumentation eines Workshops vom 11./12. November 2002 in Leipzig, veranstaltet von der Universität Leipzig, Institut für Umwelt und Planungsrecht, un dem Bundesverband Braunkohle DEBRIV.</string>
            <string language="en">Documentation of a workshop on November 11 and 12, 2002 in Leipzig, organized by the University of Leipzig, department of environmental law, and the Bundesverband Braunkohle DEBRIV (Federal association of brown coal DEBRIV).</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Documentation d'un atelier novembre 11 et 12, 
2002 à Leipzig, organisé par l'université de Leipzig, service de 
loi environnementale, et du Bundesverband Braunkohle DEBRIV 
(association fédérale de lignite DEBRIV).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Documentação de uma oficina novembro 11 e em 
12, 2002 em Leipzig, organizado pela universidade de Leipzig, 
departamento da lei ambiental, e do Bundesverband Braunkohle DEBRIV 
(associação federal do carvão marrom DEBRIV).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Documentazione di un workshop il 12 novembre 11 e
2002 a Leipzig, organizzato dall'università di Leipzig, reparto di 
legge ambientale e del Bundesverband Braunkohle DEBRIV (associazione 
federale di lignite DEBRIV).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεκμηρίωση ενός εργαστηρίου στις 11 και 12 
Νοεμβρίου ..2002 στη Λειψία, που οργανώνεται από το 
πανεπιστήμιο της Λειψίας, του τμήματος περιβαλλοντικού νόμου, και
του Bundesverband Braunkohle DEBRIV (ομοσπονδιακή ένωση του
καφετιού άνθρακα DEBRIV).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Documentación de un taller 11 de noviembre y 
12 de 2002 en Leipzig, ordenada por la universidad de Leipzig, 
departamento de la ley ambiental, y del Bundesverband Braunkohle 
DEBRIV (asociación federal del lignito DEBRIV).</string>
          </description>
